server.model.interfaces
Interface ServerRemote

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
Server
public interface ServerRemote
extends java.rmi.Remote

This class allows for a client to use all the features of the chat

Method Summary
 boolean addClient(java.lang.String nickname, ClientRemote client_stub)
          Register a client in to the server, a client must have a unique identifier.
 boolean broadcast(Message msg)
          Broadcast one message to all the clients connected to the chat.
 java.util.LinkedList<Message> getHistory()
          Return the deserialized history.
 boolean removeClient(java.lang.String nickname)
          Unregister a client from the server using his nickname.
 

Method Detail

broadcast

boolean broadcast(Message msg)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Broadcast one message to all the clients connected to the chat.

Parameters:
msg - message to be transimted.
Returns:
true if all the messages were transmited,
false if at least one failed This return value is more as an tips that a real return value.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

addClient

boolean addClient(java.lang.String nickname,
                  ClientRemote client_stub)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Register a client in to the server, a client must have a unique identifier.

Parameters:
nickname - client's identifier.
client_stub - client's reference of the remote object.
Returns:
true if the client were added,
false if another client has already the same identifier.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

removeClient

boolean removeClient(java.lang.String nickname)
                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Unregister a client from the server using his nickname.

Parameters:
nickname - client's to be removed
Returns:
true if the client were successfully removed,
false if the nickname is not presents in the server.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
